mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report WHERE result = 'P1'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM(SELECT r.*, m.punish_count FROM report r JOIN member m ON r.punished_id = m.member_id WHERE result = 'P1' ORDER BY r.report_date DESC) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT r.report_id , r.reporter_id , r.post_id , r.punished_id , r.report_date , r.report_reason , r.content , r.result , m.punish_count FROM report r JOIN member m ON r.punished_id = m.member_id WHERE r.report_id = #{reportId}
